name: Golf, yes?
description:
Share your score! Leave a screenshot in this page's comments! :)

"One of the golfing games of all time." - Golfing Videogames Weekly*

"I will never see golf in the same way again." - Golf Maniacs Magazine*

Golf, yes? is a game about figuring out the meaning of golf, with the help of an AI companion. You will cry. You will laugh. You will say "I'm playing... golf, yes?"

...Maybe.

Controls:

Click and drag to hit the ball.

RMB to skip dialogue.

* Might not be real quotes.

Source code:

https://github.com/Fabianofski/WOWIEJAM2022
